product_name: New Balance MT00v2 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: The zero-drop New Balance MT00v2 Trail-Running Shoes have sticky rubber outsoles with deep lugs for excellent traction on slick, muddy trails. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike, promoting forward momentum and reducing the impact of heel strikes. Vibram(R) rubber outsoles have extra-large trail lugs that dig into slippery trails. Synthetic mesh uppers with synthetic overlays breathe well to help your feet stay cool. The New Balance MT00v2 Trail-Running Shoes feature no-sew material application to ensure a comfortable fit.
short_description: The zero-drop New Balance MT00v2 Trail-Running Shoes have sticky rubber outsoles with deep lugs for excellent traction on slick, muddy trails.
